text: Does anyone have experience with PyS60 mobile development
I am in the position of having to make a technology choice early in a project which is targetted at mobile phones.
I saw that there is a python derivative for S60 and wondered whether anyone could share experiences, good and bad, and suggest appropriate IDE's and emulators.
Please don't tell me that I should be developing on Windows Mobile, I have already decided not to do that so will mark those answers down.
